pr_title: DB-9714 Support time travel SELECT statements with tx id

timeline.message:
Support time travel SELECT statements with tx id.

- add parser extensions to support AS OF clause.
- only the tx id is supported.
- propagate the transaction id down the execution tree to
  TableScanOperation.
- adapt code generation to pass the tx id to TableScanOperation
  at runtime.
- add tests

timeline.author: arnaud-splice

timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText:
I tried but I couldn't find a good alternative, I mean with your proposal we would bind AS OF with having an alias (line 10936) which is not necessary.
Ideally we should allow the following cases:

<ALIAS>
AS <ALIAS>
<ALIAS> AS OF ...
AS <ALIAS> AS OF ...
AS OF ...
I couldn't find single rule for all these cases that why I broke it in two.
